languages.text: {n}В последний миг Соломон опускает оружие, без колебаний встречая смерть. Глейто лишь рефлекторно дергается в сторону хозяина — и замирает. Алые визоры мерцают, сигнализируя о сбое в имплантах.{/n}

{n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В последний миг Соломон опускает оружие, без колебаний встречая смерть. Глейто лишь рефлекторно дергается в сторону хозяина — и замирает. Алые визоры мерцают, сигнализируя о сбое в имплантах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death with complete lack of hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signaling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

{n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは最後の瞬間に武器を下ろし、ためらうことなく死を受け入れた。グライトは反射的に主人の方を向き、その後動きを止めた。赤いバイザーが点滅し、サイバーマスチフのインプラントに不具合が発生したことを知らせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは最後の瞬間に武器を下ろし、ためらうことなく死を受け入れた。グライトは反射的に主人の方を向き、その後動きを止めた。赤いバイザーが点滅し、サイバーマスチフのインプラントに不具合が発生したことを知らせた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne senkt seine Waffe im letzten Moment und nimmt seinen Tod ohne Zögern hin. Glaito schnellt reflexartig auf seinen Herren zu und erstarrt dann. Die violetten Visoren flackern und signalisieren eine Fehlfunktion in den Implantaten des Cyber-Mastiff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne senkt seine Waffe im letzten Moment und nimmt seinen Tod ohne Zögern hin. Glaito schnellt reflexartig auf seinen Herren zu und erstarrt dann. Die violetten Visoren flackern und signalisieren eine Fehlfunktion in den Implantaten des Cyber-Mastiff.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne attend le dernier moment pour abaisser son arme, prêt à affronter la mort sans la moindre hésitation. Par réflexe, Glaito bondit auprès de son maître avant de s'immobiliser. Ses visières écarlates clignotent, indiquant un dysfonctionnement des implants du cyber-mastiff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne attend le dernier moment pour abaisser son arme, prêt à affronter la mort sans la moindre hésitation. Par réflexe, Glaito bondit auprès de son maître avant de s'immobiliser. Ses visières écarlates clignotent, indiquant un dysfonctionnement des implants du cyber-mastiff.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne baja el arma en el último instante, afrontando su muerte sin vacilar. Glaito hace ademán de proteger a su amo por acto reflejo, pero se detiene en el acto. Sus visores escarlata parpadean, lo que indica algún tipo de fallo en los implantes del cibermastín.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne baja el arma en el último instante, afrontando su muerte sin vacilar. Glaito hace ademán de proteger a su amo por acto reflejo, pero se detiene en el acto. Sus visores escarlata parpadean, lo que indica algún tipo de fallo en los implantes del cibermastín.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙在死前最后一刻放下了武器，毫不犹豫地接受了死亡。格雷托本能地向主人的方向抽搐了一下，随后僵在了原地。它猩红色的面甲不断闪烁，表明这只生化獒犬的植入物出现了故障。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙在死前最后一刻放下了武器，毫不犹豫地接受了死亡。格雷托本能地向主人的方向抽搐了一下，随后僵在了原地。它猩红色的面甲不断闪烁，表明这只生化獒犬的植入物出现了故障。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne son anda silahını indirip hiç tereddüt etmeden ölümüyle yüzleşiyor. Glaito, istemsizce efendisine doğru atılıp sonrasında donakalıyor. Siber mastifin implantlarındaki bir arızayı işaret eden kırmızı vizörü, yanıp sönmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne lowers his weapon at the last moment, facing his death without any hesitation. Glaito jerks reflexively toward his master and then freezes. The scarlet visors flicker, signalling a malfunction in the cyber-mastiff's implants.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne son anda silahını indirir ve hiç tereddüt etmeden ölümüyle yüzleşir. Glaito, istemsizce efendisine doğru atılır ve ardından donakalır. Siber mastifin implantlarındaki bir arızaya işaret eden kırmızı vizörü yanıp sönmeye başlar.{/n}
